name: parsimonious
description: Utilities for Parse Server cloud code and JS SDK

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run compile; npm run docs; git add .; git commit -m 'prepublishOnly'; git push origin master;
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md --template README.hbs --files ./src/index.js --param-list-format table > README.1; shx sed 's/\* \[new Parsimonious\(\)\]\(#new_Parsimonious_new\)//' README.1 > README.2; shx sed 's/### new Parsimonious\(\)//' README.2 > README.md; shx rm -rf README.1 README.2
